title: The discovery of a London monster, called, the blacke dogg of New-gate profitable for all readers to take heed by.
author: Hutton, Luke, d. 1596.
publisher: By M[armaduke] P[arsons] for Robert Wilson, at his shop at Grayes-Inne Gate in Holborne,
notes: Originally published in 1596 as "The blacke dogge of Newgate". This edition is rearranged with additions attributed to Samuel Rowlands--STC.
Running title reads: The blacke dog of New-gate.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
